subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Charlotte Bobcats’ starting shooting guard Raja Bell will miss at least two games with a groin injury. Bell strained his right groin late in the third quarter of Charlotte’s loss to Atlanta on Friday. Bell, who missed five games just over a month go with a similar injury, said Saturday that he would not play Sunday at Miami or Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers.
